mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT ( pd_code, pd_name, pd_rmcost, pd_manufcost, pd_sort, pd_delete ) values ( 'p' || TO_CHAR(pd_code.nextval), #{pd_name}, #{pd_rmcost}, #{pd_manufcost}, #{pd_sort}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT m.mfseq ,m.pd_code ,p.pd_name ,TO_CHAR(m.manuf_startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS manuf_startdate ,TO_CHAR(m.manuf_enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS manuf_enddate ,m.manuf_status ,m.warehouse_code ,m.manuf_amount ,m.manuf_requserid ,TO_CHAR(m.manuf_reqdate , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS manuf_reqdate ,mf_delete FROM manufacture m, product p WHERE m.pd_code = p.pd_code and mf_delete='N'
SELECT pd_code ,pd_name ,pd_rmcost ,pd_manufcost ,pd_sort ,pd_delete FROM product WHERE pd_delete='N'
SELECT pd_code ,pd_name ,pd_rmcost ,pd_manufcost ,pd_sort FROM product WHERE pd_code=(SELECT MAX(pd_code) FROM product )
